p: A/Texas/36/1991 (H1N1), which was determined to be in the antigenic cluster A(H1N1)season1977-SG86, was propagated in MDCK cells. Viruses will be ultra-centrifuged as described elsewhere [ 54]. The HA of A/Texas/36/1991 (H1N1) was sequenced using sanger sequencing and used for glycopeptide mapping in the glycoproteomics analyses.
